column5: Cute three bedroom house located in a quiet neighborhood four miles from The Woodlands center. It is a great location to stay if you are visiting for concerts, races, conferences and shopping. There are two queen beds and a bunk bed with two double beds, plus a large air mattress for extra guests. The master closet will be locked, but there is plenty of space for hanging clothes.
column8: 3 BR house near The Woodlands Mall
